meanings.definition: To write again, especially in a different way.
meanings.sent1: She rewrote her story to make it more exciting.
meanings.sent2: He rewrote the essay to correct the mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The student rewrote his homework with colorful markers.
meanings.sent4: The artist rewrote the painting with bold strokes.
meanings.sent5: After receiving feedback, she rewrote the song with a new melody.

meanings.definition: To revise or amend written material.
meanings.sent1: The editor rewrote the article for clarity.
meanings.sent2: They rewrote the contract to include the new terms.
meanings.sent3: The teacher rewrote the test with tricky questions.
meanings.sent4: He rewrote his speech with powerful rhetoric.
meanings.sent5: After the feedback, she rewrote the letter with a more formal tone.
